oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation by Dr. Ronnie Coffman,Dircetor of International Programs, College of Agricultural and Life Sciences, Cornell University (USA), delivered at the Borlaug Summit on Wheat for Food Security in Ciudad Obregon (Mexico) on March 26, 2014.
